entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
